addon_description.message: Converts obfuscated/nested links to genuine clean links

bootstrap_whitelist_description.message: This is a current-session list for the cleaned links and the original they came from, for ease whitelisting. Please note you will be whitelisting whole websites, while sometimes it is good just picking a tag of the URL to add it to the "matching" option.

skipwhen_tooltip.message: This is a REGEXP Pattern urls will be checked against so that links to sharing platforms and such will not get broken. case-sensitive.

remove_tooltip.message: This is a regexp pattern which will be applied over links to remove tracking tags and such. case-insensitive.

skipdoms_tooltip.message: Comma-separated list of domains whose links won't be cleared.

hlstyle_content.message: Apply this CSS Style to cleaned links.

repdelay_tooltip.message: Reapply cleaning of links after the specified number of seconds. This is for non-Delegation Mode only, set it to 0 to disable it.

evdm_tooltip.message: This is a less intrusive mode by just listening to click events. Note that real-time highlighting and counters will not work then, even though the performance should be much better.

cbc_title.message: Copy clean links from the context menu

cbc_tooltip.message: This extendes the context-menu with a Copy Clean Link entry to clear links before being copied to the clipboard.

progltr_tooltip.message: Set up a HTTP Observer to catch 3xx redirections. For example, this should make possible to clear links hidden behind shortened URLs.

gotarget_tooltip.message: Whether the target attribute on links should be checked and respected.

reset_tooltip.message: Reset options to their default values.

ignhttp_tooltip.message: This options causes non-http/s links to be ignored when checking for nested urls on them.

textcl_tooltip.message: Allows clicking on non-clickable text-links to open them as normal links - Requires Event Delegation Mode.

cltrack_content.message: Enabling this option will perform tracking of cleaned links to easily whitelist their domains by right-clicking the toolbar button.

httpomr_tootltip.message: Setup an http request listener that can clean links from outside firefox, or initiated automatically by a page such as refreshes.

switchToTab_title.message: Switch to tabs opened by clicking links?

switchToTab_tooltip.message: When you open a link in a new tab, switch to it immediately. This copies the same-named browser preference, that can not be accessed at present.
